metadata.institution: National University of Computer & Emerging Sciences (FAST-NUCES)

DAIDS.name: Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
DAIDS.description: Welcome to the Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science — where innovation meets insight. Our mission is to nurture critical thinkers, innovators, and problem-solvers equipped to harness the power of data and AI for real-world impact.

DCS.name: Computer Science
DCS.description: The Department of Computer Science at FAST School of Computing is dedicated to providing world-class education and research in computing. Our programs blend theoretical foundations with hands-on experience to equip students with the skills and mindset required to solve real-world problems. With a focus on innovation, collaboration, and entrepreneurship, we nurture talent capable of shaping the digital future—both locally and globally.

DSE.name: Software Engineering
DSE.description: The Department of Software Engineering at FAST School of Computing is committed to preparing professionals equipped with the skills to design, build, and manage complex software systems. Our curriculum integrates software design principles, engineering methodologies, and cutting-edge technologies to address real-world challenges. With an emphasis on quality assurance, teamwork, and innovation, the department nurtures students to become competent software engineers ready to lead in the global technology landscape.

DCY.name: Cyber Security
DCY.description: The Department of Cyber Security is dedicated to advancing knowledge and expertise in safeguarding digital systems, networks, and data. Our programs focus on developing highly skilled professionals capable of addressing complex cybersecurity challenges through technical excellence, analytical thinking, and ethical responsibility.

DCE.name: Computer Engineering
DCE.description: The Department of Computer Engineering at the FAST School of Engineering focuses on developing the next generation of computing professionals equipped to tackle emerging technological challenges. The program integrates computer architecture, embedded systems, networking, and hardware-software co-design to provide a strong foundation in both theory and application. Through hands-on projects, advanced laboratories, and research-driven learning, students gain the skills needed to excel in industries such as automation, robotics, IoT, and AI-driven hardware systems. Our graduates are prepared to lead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape where innovation meets real-world impact.

DEE.name: Electrical Engineering
DEE.description: The Department of Electrical Engineering at the FAST School of Engineering is dedicated to developing skilled engineers capable of addressing the world’s growing technological challenges. Our program blends theoretical foundations with hands-on experience in circuit design, embedded systems, telecommunications, and power engineering. Through modern laboratories, research initiatives, and industry collaborations, we prepare students to contribute effectively to innovation, sustainability, and national development. The department strives to cultivate analytical thinking, creativity, and leadership among future electrical engineers.

DMS.name: Management Sciences
DMS.description: The Department of Management Sciences at the FAST School of Management welcomes you...To a place of possibilities. We encourage students to recognize the profound responsibility that they have towards themselves, their peers, their families, and society. We encourage them to create every opportunity to engage deeply, question openly, and work closely with our dedicated faculty. Our students learn about envisioning strategic impact, optimizing processes, understanding market complexities, and building strong, effective teams, along with research projects on topics such as diversity, entrepreneurship, Gen AI, business analytics and sustainability. To a place of partnership. As we take on the responsibility to groom responsible professionals, we challenge everyone in the ecosystem to step beyond the familiar. We endeavor to drive change by fostering meaningful collaborations with visionaries comprising research partners, potential employers and philanthropists across academia, industry, and non-profits. Undoubtedly, it is our partners who enrich our curriculum and facilitate student professional development through seminars, co-designed courses, internships, final year projects, and community engagement initiatives.To a place of promise. We invite you to explore our programs, visit our beautiful campus, and meet our faculty.

DAF.name: Accounting & Finance

faculty.name: Ms. Syeda Hoor ul ain Ali

DAF.description: It is a privilege to welcome you to the Department of Accounting and Finance, a dynamic hub where innovation, analytical excellence, and ethical leadership converge. As global finance continues to evolve through digital transformation, sustainability, and data-driven decision-making, our department stands committed to preparing the next generation of professionals and thought leaders who will shape this exciting future.We pride ourselves on fostering a learning environment that integrates academic rigor with practical relevance. Our programs combine the foundational principles of accounting and finance with the latest developments in financial technology, analytics, and sustainability. Through research-driven teaching, experiential learning, and strong industry linkages, we empower our students to think critically, act responsibly, and innovate confidently in an increasingly digital financial world.To our students, I encourage you to make the most of this journey; learn boldly, collaborate openly, and challenge ideas with curiosity and courage. Your growth, creativity, and integrity will define the future of the financial ecosystem.To our faculty, researchers, and industry partners, I extend an open invitation to collaborate with us in advancing impactful research, knowledge exchange, and innovation. Together, we can co-create solutions that address the pressing challenges of our time, from financial inclusion and sustainability to responsible digital transformation.As we continue to build bridges between academia, industry, and society, our shared goal remains clear: to contribute to a more inclusive, transparent, and resilient financial future.Welcome to a department where ideas inspire action, collaboration drives progress and learning shapes leaders for a better tomorrow.

DSH.name: Sciences & Humanities
DSH.description: The Department of Sciences & Humanities (DSH) plays a pivotal role in shaping the academic experience at FAST-NUCES Islamabad. By integrating fundamental sciences with courses in communication, ethics, and social awareness, the department nurtures analytical thinking, creativity, and emotional intelligence among students.
